pages.text: $(li)The Diamond Pickaxe is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/iron_pickaxe)Iron Pickaxe$(/l).$(br)$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/obsidian)Obsidian$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/crying_obsidian)Crying Obsidian$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ancient_debris)Ancient Debris$(/l).

pages.text: The Diamond Pickaxe has more durability than the last one.
